SEARCH
Package dat3.kino.service

Class ScreeningService

java.lang.Object
dat3.kino.service.ScreeningService
@Service public class ScreeningService extends Object
This service class provides methods to perform operations related to screenings.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScreeningService

      public ScreeningService(ScreeningRepository screeningRepository, MovieRepository movieRepository, CinemaRepository cinemaRepository, ScreenRepository screenRepository)
      Constructs a new ScreeningService with the specified repositories.
      Parameters:
      screeningRepository - The repository for accessing screening data.
      movieRepository - The repository for accessing movie data.
      cinemaRepository - The repository for accessing cinema data.
      screenRepository - The repository for accessing screen data.

  • Method Details

    • getAllScreenings

      public List<ScreeningDTO> getAllScreenings()
      Retrieves all screenings and converts them to DTOs.
      Returns:
      A list of ScreeningDTOs representing all screenings.

    • getScreeningById

      public ScreeningDTO getScreeningById(int id)
      Retrieves a screening by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the screening to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The ScreeningDTO representing the screening with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - If the screening with the given ID is not found.

    • getScreeningsByCinemaId

      public List<ScreeningDTO> getScreeningsByCinemaId(int cinemaId)
      Retrieves all screenings associated with a cinema.
      Parameters:
      cinemaId - The ID of the cinema.
      Returns:
      A list of ScreeningDTOs representing all screenings associated with the specified cinema.

    • createScreening

      public ScreeningDTO createScreening(ScreeningDTO screeningDTO)
      Creates a new screening.
      Parameters:
      screeningDTO - The DTO containing information about the screening to be created.
      Returns:
      The ScreeningDTO representing the created screening.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - If the associated movie, cinema, or screen is not found.

    • deleteScreening

      public void deleteScreening(int id)
      Deletes a screening by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the screening to delete.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - If the screening with the given ID is not found.
